entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 01:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
